task.title: Connect Oxygen Content Fusion to Netlify
task.shortdesc: This task will show you how to connect a project in Oxygen Content Fusion to Netlify.

taskbody.prereq: You must have created a publication in Oxygen Content Fusion.

context.p: Learn how to connect a project in Oxygen Content Fusion to Netlify that will allow you to publish Oxygen's deliverables through Netlify.

substep.cmd: Open project in Oxygen and exit personal workspace by clicking the project name

fig.title: Screen capture of connector tab in Oxygen

image.alt: Screen capture showing connector tab and new connector button in Oxygen.

substep.cmd: Select "Netlify" from the drop down menu
In the pop up, enter a title and paste the site ID copied from Netlify

fig.title: Screen capture of new Netlify connector pop up in Oxygen

image.alt: Screen capture showing new Netlify connector pop up in Oxygen.

substep.cmd: Open Netlify and go to user settings

fig.title: Screen capture of user setting in Netlify

image.alt: Screen capture with an arrow showing user settings in Netlify.

substep.cmd: Enter a description and set expiration date
Click "generate token" then copy the token

fig.title: Screen capture of new personal access token page in Netlify

image.alt: Screen capture showing new personal access token page in Netlify.

substep.cmd: Return to Oxygen and paste token in the connector pop up then click "submit"
